page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{ FARMING:}There are 18 employees on the Shanes Castle Estate.They are employed as Office Staff Farm Labourers Tractor Drivers Railway Staff Estate Manager Dairy Man Shepherd All but two of these estate employees live in estate cottages.
{ FORESTRY:}Apart from the Head Forester who lives at the entrance to the forest there are no permanent employees at Randalstown Forest. Planting and felling is carried out by a gang of forrestry workers employed by the Ministry of Agriculture to work in several of its forests. The guides are part-time employees.
